mapper.insert: insert into Home_Banner( ID, Banner_Title, Url, Links, Indexs, Statu, Opt_Id) values (#{id},#{bannerTitle},#{url},#{links},#{indexs},#{statu}, #{optId})
mapper.select: select ID, Banner_Title, Url, Links, Indexs, Statu, CreateTime, Opt_Date, Opt_Id from Home_Banner where Banner_Title=#{bannerTitle} and ID != #{id}
mapper.update:
update Home_Banner
Banner_Title=#{bannerTitle},
Url=#{url},
Links=#{links},
Opt_Id=#{optId},
Opt_Date=now() ,
where ID=#{id}
update Home_Banner set Statu=#{statu} where ID=#{id}
mapper.select: select ifnull(Indexs,0) from Home_Banner order by Indexs desc limit 1
select hb.ID, hb.Banner_Title, hb.Url, hb.Links, hb.Indexs, hb.Statu, hb.CreateTime, hb.Opt_Date, hb.Opt_Id from Home_Banner hb where hb.Statu = 1
